Professional looking photos

Is your ambition to be a successful model, actor, anchor and filmmaker and be considered for top assignments?

Joinfilms.com can help you to get that exposure that can make the difference. Our process is simple, and the best way to break into the industry. If you want to go ahead in the industry you have to upload professional looking photos. You too can have photos like our top join films members.

 

Remember your main photo will automatically be sized-down to thumbnail size for casting searches. Post a professional looking photo.

Well-structured and professional portfolio

Your portfolio will drive the success of your career. Retouched photos are proven to generate superior casting opportunities.

 

Casting agents regularly browse through our member portfolios and they have specific requirements that if not met, will lead them to pass you over every time. An actor’s portfolio serves as an introduction to agents and casting directors. You have very little time to capture attention, but glitzy or gimmicky portfolios generally end up in the trash. Instead, create a well-structured, professional portfolio that contains only the critical information. Your portfolio contents may vary slightly depending on your previous experience.

Have natural photographs

Crop your photographs properly: Your face or body should take up almost the entire space in the photographs.

  

Nothing should obstruct your face including hats, sunglasses and hair. Look straight at the camera with a soft expression. Photographs should have good colour and contrast that reflects you naturally without lots of makeup.

 

Keep photograph background clear and simple. (Should not be in your living room!). Photos should be of professional looking (even if taken by a friend) without red-eye or low quality. No hats, sunglasses or hair in your face. No blurry or grainy photos. No photos that is too dark or too light. No − absolutely no − webcam photos. No text or border. No photos showing you looking to one side. No more than one person in the photo (unless you are identical twins). No props or pets in your photo.

A GOOD PORTFOLIO CAN MAKE YOUR CAREER. YOU TOO CAN HAVE PHOTOS LIKE OUR TOP JOINFILMS MEMBERS, WE CAN HELP YOU. SEND US YOUR REQUEST FOR PORTFOLIO SHOOT.
